summary: This is a travel authorization notification email from the Department of Justice's E2 travel system. It approves travel for a DOJ employee to Santa Monica, CA from December 15-18, 2019, for the purpose of conducting a witness interview in the case of U.S. v. Epstein.

events.title: Witness Interview Travel Authorization
events.description: A Department of Justice travel authorization is approved for an employee to travel to Santa Monica, CA to conduct a witness interview for the U.S. v. Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is a travel authorization for a DOJ employee related to the U.S. v. Epstein case.
The purpose of the travel was to conduct a witness interview in Santa Monica, CA.
The document indicates ongoing investigative activity in the Epstein case as of late 2019.
The travel was authorized through the DOJ's official E2 travel system.
